is it start on empty datadir? or on existing one? 
hotfix: remove datadir/nodes folder

Im getting this as well. Erigon just fails to launch.

Something is broken in mdbx which is whats causing this stack error. 

go-mdbx is causing an access violation on windows.

For anyone having the issue, make sure that you have the latest GCC compiler installed via mingw, default mingw-w64 from internet will install you the older one, so I recommend you to check out https://github.com/niXman/mingw-builds-binaries/releases or the chocolatey manager.
